Performer:
Yoshida Kanroku (see also Kiritake Kanroku) (吉田勘緑)

Alternate Name: Kiritake Kanroku (桐竹勘緑)

Dates: '1986/11-'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


Performances as Puppeteer:

January 1987: A Tragic Love Triangle

February 1987: The Courtesan Yugiri

March 1987: The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil

April 1987: The Tycoon's Exploit

June 1987 Harajuku Bunraku: The Love Suicides at Sonezaki

September 1987: The Tales of Ise

November 1987: The Battle of Sakamoto Castle
